pr_title: Add timeout for waitForStringInLogUsingMark for assertNull checks in logging FAT

timeline.bodyText: Change this to a static variable.
timeline.author: fmhwong

timeline.bodyText:
Not sure what is the purpose of this test.

It changed the server configuration.
Set log mark to the end
Wait for "message"
There was no operation between step 2 and 3 and nothing would happen and the wait operation will wait until timeout 100%.
timeline.author: fmhwong
